content.newsInsight: Xi's military purges just revealed China's nuclear forces are in chaos. Everyone's debating warheads and missiles. Wrong variable. When you purge your nuclear command twice in 18 months, you're not worried about weapons. You're worried about loyalty.
content.patternInsight: You're still reading. That already puts you ahead.
content.intelligenceExample: Xi's nuclear purges, for example. We read that and our mind goes to: if you can't trust the guys with the launch codes, what exactly are you planning that requires absolute loyalty over competence?
